H0.text: Long hair is a trait that children can inherit from their parents.

H1.text: Favorite color is a trait that children can inherit from their parents.

H2.text: Brown eyes is a trait that children can inherit from their parents.

H3.text: A broken arm is a trait that children can inherit from their parents.

A4.text: Eye color is an inherited trait determined by multiple genes.

A5.text: The genetics of eye color are so complex that almost any parent-child combination of eye colors can occur.
